Metadata: Confluence is a newsletter of Oregon Sea Grant. The following articles by Tiffany Woods are in this issue: Interns aim to help Oregon companies reduce waste, save money; PSU researchers find suspected microplastics in Oregon oysters; Tours show consumers how to buy seafood from fishermen and markets; Tourism expert helps outdoor recreation companies on Oregon coast; 6 Oregon salt marshes have stayed ahead of rising sea, study says; Diverse perspectives are represented at state capitol, by Bryn Hudson.
